sourcesContent:
Cart

{{ item.name }} {{ item.price | currency }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Product, products} from "../products"; @Component({ selector: 'app-shopping-cart', templateUrl: './shopping-cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./shopping-cart.component.css'] }) export class ShoppingCartComponent { items :Product[] = []; addToCart(product: Product) { this.items.push(product); } }
